group_1.textLeft: Please don't worry about it.

group_1.textRight: So, that's why the preparations for the Mizuna Girls' Academy meeting aren't progressing...
Well... I'm in charge of reserving the classroom for @the event.
I asked my senpai how I should do this.
But, my senpai got sick, and can't come to school @now.

group_1.textLeft: Well...

group_1.textRight: My other senpai had to take time off for family reasons...
By the time I noticed, I had to do everything myself...
You should've asked me to help!

group_1.textLeft: But you haven't helped set up for the event before...

group_1.textRight: Uuuf...

group_1.textLeft: What about me? Why didn't you come ask me for @help?

group_1.textRight: Well... You had decided to help solve everyone's problems.
You were already doing so much by yourself.
That's why I wanted to solve it on my own...
Besides, I didn't want to bother you when you're working so hard...

group_1.textLeft: Hotori...

group_1.textRight: But, I ended up bothering you in the end... @Sorry...

group_1.textLeft: Please don't apologize Hotori.
I'm the one who has been wasting your precious @time.

group_1.textRight: That's not true...

group_1.textLeft: Thank you for taking the time to help me out with @my idea.
And... I'm sorry I didn't notice your problem.
I thought by following my bible I could get closer to "that person".
But instead I just missed the needs of the people closest to me...

group_1.textRight: Yuuna...

group_1.textLeft: But please, just leave everything to me.

group_1.textRight: Eh?

group_1.textLeft: I will definitely help you Hotori!

group_1.textRight: Yay...!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you.
Now then, let's review the preparations for the event again.
In addition to preparing the classrooms for the exchange event,
We need to prepare sweets and tea for the Mizuna @Girls' Academy students.
And then we need to have some entertainment prepared.
It's impossible for the student council to prepare everything on its own.
It's important to get students from the other clubs @to help too.

group_1.textRight: But we only have two days left until the event, right?
I might be able to get a classroom, @and some tea for the event.
But the entertainment...

group_1.textLeft: Yes, that will be difficult...
So, let's find a way to solve this.
We should start by visiting each club.
And we can ask them what they can do to help.

group_1.textRight: Amazing, Yuuna...!
I know what to do now,@[chara:304101:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:304101:cheek_0][chara:304101:face_mtn_ex_040.exp.json][chara:304101:lipSynch_1]but I don't know if I can do it alone...

group_1.textLeft: I will go with you, since I am your student council senpai.
Let's do our best to make this a successful exchange event Hotori!

group_1.textRight: Yeah! Thanks!
